attributes.title: ✨weakling✨

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I was super excited to use the app but suddenly I was shot down and died and I’m certain it was because of the app. I personally don’t believe in bad luck, but this instance came the second I opened the app, so I have to doubt it had something to do with it. Nevertheless, there are also bugs and it’s an awful app overall.
